Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone!

I learned about KSP yesterday from one of the webcomics I follow, and I\'ve become a bit of an addict. I haven\'t stayed up an entire night playing a good game in a long time. I haven\'t made it to the Mun yet (or even into orbit!) but I\'ve been tinkering and playing around with the various parts and browsing the wiki. I\'m amazed at how well-written the articles are!

Needless to say, I\'m hoping to be a part of this great community for this great game.

And, just as a 'this is what I\'ve done so far', here\'s a picture of a hoverplane I\'ve been working on. It hovers pretty well (took hours to keep it from flipping end-over-end) and lands nicely, although it can\'t reach the upper atmosphere because it uses basic jets.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
